text:
PROFESSOR: In Chapter 1,
we'll study the transfer

Specifically, we'll consider
bacteria and virus, which

originate in the lungs or
in the pharynx in the body

and are transmitted
by forming droplets

during the act of exhaling--
by breathing, or speaking,

and we'll study the
fate of those droplets.

Will they fall and sediment
to different surfaces?

Or will they be inhaled by an
susceptible person
